/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various hues of the buildings.
